# Visual Studio
.vs/
*.suo
*.user

*.sln.docstates

bin/
obj/
out/

# Rider IDE
.idea/

# Node/npm
node_modules/

# Logs
*.log

*.nupkg
*.snupkg
*.vsix

# Redis / database files (if any local DBs exist)
*.rdb
*.aof

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Coverlet / code coverage
coverage/
*.coverage
*.coveragexml

# Temporary files
*.tmp
